content: I placed an order at full price and it came to $71. Then some weeks later I received a 30% discount for all restaurants. I went back to order the same menu, order again, and my total price came to $72. I noticed that the prices were raised just slightly above 30% so my actual discount cost me $1 more than the regular price. This is a bit of a scam because I wouldnâ€™t have known had I not checked a previous order, I feel like Iâ€™m being scammed here and itâ€™s not it just one restaurant itâ€™s all the restaurants! ğŸ‘ğŸ‘

What's the point of a business if you do not take customer complaints serious? This is the third time I've ordered food on the app and had delivery complications. I can't reach the rider and I'm literally telling you I'm not able to reach the rider and I get automated responses? How does that even help? The customer service really needs to be improved on. Like why can't I even call to make that complaint? It is just super frustrating. I totally won't recommend this app to anyone. Terrible customer service!

I will never recommend to anyone!!!
I got to a new place and needed food so I downloaded the app to order some KFC. The rider wasnâ€™t moving much on the map. I waited till a minute to estimated delivery time and called him after several tries before he picked up and wouldnâ€™t speak when he did. Food never came and payment had already been made. Contacted support and was told rider claimed came to my doorstep and waited over 15 minutes but and all attempts to contact me failed and so my money will not be refunded.

This garbage app tried to force me to pay for food that was delivered that was partially opened and had the wrong items. Instead of them resolving the issue they wanted to make me pay for the food when I refused the driver correctly took the food with him but then Bolt told me I have to pay a debt for the opened food and wrong items after they already took the food back!!! This is the absolute poorest delivery service I have ever encountered, they really donâ€™t care about the customer nor the product they serve!

The customer support or message center on this app is trash. I had a delivery driver get here and he sat outside for 30 minutes plus. I messaged on the app and asked if there was a problem, and then they said oh heâ€™s trying to reach you, but canâ€™t. I called him, and the driver himself had issues, but I got my food. But then I told customer service why would he wait that long to not tell them he needed help so they could get hold of me. Make zero sense and they had poor responding time and did nothing to help.

Overall the app and service had worked well, until a problem arose. The customer service tries to give you an automatic refund to avoid service calls. But the one time that a restaurant sent me the wrong order and I contacted them, theyâ€™ve done a horrendous job of addressing or fixing the problem. A restaurant sent the wrong order and I sent the a photo and description of the issue. But the service has done horribly to actually have someone figure it out.

Good luck getting your order after itâ€™s been paid for. They have absolutely no control over their dispatch riders. The app will tell you your food has been delivered but youâ€™ll never get it. Youâ€™ll reach out to their absolutely inept customer service who will tell you theyâ€™ll get back to you but that will be never or maybe when pigs fly. Your money will be gone and youâ€™ll be left hungry, frustrated with no food and less money.

You will rarely get a delivery up to par with the original dine-in service. But compared to other food delivery services in Ghana, maybe itâ€™s better to receive mid quality goods, and sometimes not even what you ordered, and have to go back and forth with bots to some kind of solution. This is my first and last review as I delete this app for good, I hope it helps.

No matter what discounts or promotions are active, the app enforces a minimum order of 40 RON. If you want to order something that costs less than 40, a fee equal to the difference is applied to your order BEFORE factoring in the delivery fee, even if the delivery fee would put you over 40. This is a greedy, disgusting practice and defeats the purpose of using the app at all.

For example, we leave on a dead end and the map shows a non-existent outlet. Itâ€™s frustrating to see the driver trying to find the street. Thereâ€™s no easy way to provide feedback and no interest to fix these problems.

Iâ€™ve using this app for a while in different countries and overall review is not good comparing with Postmates or Doordash due to their customer services. After using this app in Azerbaijan Iâ€™ve faced issues with food delivery, trying to resolve it with customer service, but no progress. They always make you wrong trying to bring ridiculous argues to make you feel down.

They have the audacity to make you wait for more than an hour and then tell you that your order was sent to a different location and all they could offer was compensation (I assume 5 gel) and waiting for the order to be prepared again. 

I was hungry before and now I'm hungry and angry. Thanks to bolt food. 

Shame on you!

For the past months now, Iâ€™ve been trying to place an order, it keeps telling me â€œ Could not place your order
Chow Hub is outside of business hours.
Please try again later, or order from somewhere else. â€œ

I uninstalled and reinstalled it so many times, but itâ€™s the same thing. Iâ€™m about to delete it and use something more reliable
Why is there Apple Pay as a payment option in Bolt but not a payment option In Bolt Food. Please add that option. Thank you

Worst food delivery option. People in Nairobi please stick to Glovo or Uber Eats. Restaurant sent wrong order. And on top of that, the food had gone bad. It was so hard to get in touch with the customer service. When they eventually replied, they only offered a refund of less than half of what I spent. Contacted them again about how to get my full refund and Iâ€™m yet to hear back. Such a scam!
When I try entering it the app keeps reloading on my phone

The last time they took 40 minutes to take the order and 30 more to bring it, when the restaurant is 4 minutes away and there is no traffic. The customer support was polite but did not solve the problem. Deleting the app and never using it again!!!
I think adding a text segment to the app wonâ€™t be a bad idea and maybe a simpler way to cancel orders too

Itâ€™s very frustrating when you have to wait for an order only for the restaurant to call you later to inform you , your order is not available will you opt to change it.

Bolt used to be good, but people are having more and more problems these days seems like.
Just think about another option before ordering on Bolt.

I was very disappointed with the service and the food. I ordered shrimps and barbecue wings with extra sauce, but it took almost two hours for the delivery. When I declined, and asked he dive safely to me, he said he was leaving the food in the floor and considering it delivered.

Iâ€™m so impressed with this service. Iâ€™ve tried all the ones that work in my area, and Bolt is faster, more reliable, has a better selection and similar prices to the cheapest competitors. Suffice it to say, I havenâ€™t used any other delivery service since I installed this app. Wish they had a web version too though.

Iâ€™m writing from Accra. I literally just downloaded the app tonight and proceeded to make my first order which was GHS99. Paid the rider GHS100. Came in the house to see he had only logged GHS40. So according to Bolt, I owe them GHS59. Now Iâ€™m not the one to complain about paying for anything but if you steal from me, all bets are off! Iâ€™m so disappointed. Iâ€™ve tried calling the rider back several times and he wonâ€™t answer my calls. I also didnâ€™t get his name because the app is weird and I canâ€™t seem to find any history of the driver information that was shared during the order. Looks like Bolt will be keeping me in debit for a lifetime because I wonâ€™t be using the app any longer. Also doesnâ€™t help that there isnâ€™t even a telephone number to call for assistance. So yâ€™all just telling me you hire thieves for drivers. Okay!

How is this even possible? Totally insane price politics. Is this because of COVID and Bolt decided to milk people because they have no choice? 

This is the first time in my life when I see increasing prices in 30-40% is called a â€œsaleâ€. 

How is this possible that you consider a sale order with minimum price of 15â‚¬ to have free delivery in just 2km (you will eventually pay 15â‚¬ + delivery even if your order is less than 15â‚¬). 

I was ordering in your app daily. I am one person and usually I order in 8-12â‚¬ range INCLUDING delivery. And now I am forced to pay 15+â‚¬ via sale? I donâ€™t even eat that much. 

Avsolutely disgusting pricing policy. Calling it â€œsaleâ€ feels like trolling... Didnâ€™t expected you will be parasiting on COVID tragedy so bad. Especially while usually delivery in radius of 2km was free som time ago. Now I have to pay 15â‚¬. THANK YOU xD

Bolt Food just launched in Georgia and I must say, this already is the best delivery service here. Iâ€™m kind of a really loyal customer of delivery services and Bolt Food is the most comfortable app Iâ€™ve used so far. Also, prices and support service are wonderful :) good job, Bolt :)

Dear Bolt, 
Youâ€™ve convinced me now (twice already in less than a week) that your app is worthless in the current conditions. I would like to emphasise this is NOT a restaurant or courrier issue, but an app issue. 

Not only did both orders arrive significantly late vs. the time communicated initially, but in both cases the food arrived barely warm, and the fact that you provide a free delivery does not help at all. 
I am totally dissapointed by your service, and will definitely stop ordering using Bolt.
Cheap delivery, easy interface, and helpful customer service. I had a problem recently and they were very responsive, kind and understanding.
Good but itâ€™s missing a tip feature. Not really convenient as I donâ€™t carry cash and it feels bad if I canâ€™t tip the driver

The Bolt App for rides has no issues with neither, and allows for cash payments as well as Apple Pay support.
